work.name: Oslo University Hospital (OUS)
work.summary: Researcher in John Arne Dahl's research group Genome and Epigenome Regulation in Embryo Development, Ageing and Disease at the Division of Laboratory Medicine, Department of Microbiology at OUS. Responsible for data management, data coordination and data analysis for Risk Factors for Community- and Workplace Transmission of COVID-19 Study (The Norwegian Covid-19 Cohort Study), and Cod Liver Oil for Covid-19 Prevention Study (CLOC-study) led by Dr. Arne Søraas.

work.name: ANYthings DATA
work.summary: Providing mentorship and consulting services related to data management, data analysis, and data handling with focus on health-, biological-, and big-data.

work.name: Oslo Metropolitan University (OsloMet)
work.summary: Guest lecturer at the Faculty of Technology, Art and Design and the Faculty of Health Sciences.

work.name: Mycoteam AS
work.summary: Consultant on topics related to health, indoor climate (microbiology, particles, asbestos, noise), construction (moisture damage, rot damages, rehabilitation), and data analysis. Advising corporate and private clients.

work.name: Faculty of Technology, Art and Design, OsloMet
work.summary: 25% lecturing and thesis supervision in the Energy and Indoor Environment in Buildings bachelor’s and master’s programs. Member of research group “Disease and Environmental Exposures” (DEEx). Associated member of research group «Innovation and Sustainability in Construction and Building Design».

education.institution: Faculty of Health Sciences, Oslo and Akershus University College (HiOA)
